channel.title: aesthetic on Hugo O. Rivera's website
channel.description: Recent content in aesthetic on Hugo O. Rivera's website

item.title: polybar-themer
item.description: A theme generator for polybar, a popular status bar for Linux. Uses math and advanced YAML parsing to generate colorful, sensible color schemes.

item.title: Animated Periodic Table D3
item.description: A periodic table created in CoffeeScript and D3 with animated transitions.
